page.title: 06AUTUMN SEAS AT CHAPEL ST. L.
page.content: Waves splashing,crashing together. High and low,bashing forever. Rougher and rougher,leaping higher and higher. Bang,wallop,smack as waves trample on each other. Tumbling over and over. Little footsteps crawl and creep up the beach. The shingle,a thousand bells ringing. A roller coaster twists round and round,up and down. Roaring and growling,echoes from the sea. Rolling wave hills,bumpity,bump. Higher and higher jump the waves as the wind swirls and twists,whipping the waves up. Tunnels of water roll along the beach. Curving,twisting,bending,gurgling as rollers thunder over and over,dashing up a deserted beach. {VIKKI CAVENS 10y
